name: Jonathan Blow Presents Fruit Salad Forever
name_original: Jonathan Blow Presents Fruit Salad Forever
description:
Shoot fruit, jump over ancestors. You can't shoot ancestors, they are ghosts.

J: Jump

K: Shoot a Knife

R: Restart

Since civilization began, every generation has chosen an elder to join the collective consciousness of their esteemed ancestors. He who can pass tests of endurance and successfully create the highly symbolic fruit salad, shall fruit salad forever.
